entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Greenstone (Beardmore)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:08 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cameron Falls 2:00 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022
Temperature: -8.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 89 %
Dewpoint: -10.2°C
Wind: SSW 1 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 11 this afternoon. Forecast issued 1:35 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 1:35 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Periods of light snow mixed with ice pellets beginning early in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 4 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 1:35 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022
